transcript: sat without stirring, either resting or, as it seemed to Pierre, sunk in pro- found and calm meditation. His servant was also a yellow, wrinkled old man, without beard or mustache, evidently not because he was shav- en but because they had never grown. This ac- tive old servant was unpacking the traveler's canteen and preparing tea. He brought in a boiling samovar.
